Class Company

java.lang.Object
  Company

public class Company
extends java.lang.Object

The Company class contains the array where the Employees are holds. It performs all the tasks that are asks int the Data Base class.Like add,find, find Weekly salary

Version:
(a version number or a date)
Author:
(Thomas Zangari)

Parameters:

Returns:
